hanzi-su-wiki:
獲

Значения

Приобретать, захватывать

Мнемоника

Сокращение. Хватать 又 сову, птицу 隹 с выпученными глазами (превратились в траву 艹), как это делает собака 犭.

Варианты

获
purpleculture_pinyin:
huò
to catch; to obtain; to capture
ловить; чтобы получить; захватить
rtega_mnemonic:
獲獲RS
获获		obtain, get, receive, seize
  • dog 犭 and a bird 蒦 hunting: they seize or get game
  • ⓢ dogs 犭犬　running on the grass 艹 during hunt trying to obtain, get or seize game
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 获)
Pictophonetic: 蒦 indicates the sound; 犭 (dog) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
獲得 [ huò dé ]: to obtain; to receive; to get
獲悉 [ huò xī ]: to learn of sth; to find out; to get news
獲取 [ huò qǔ ]: to gain; to get; to acquire
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 犭 [ quǎn ] dog
    • 蒦 [ huò ] to measure; to calculate
heisig_chinese_memo: A pack of genetically-modified wild dogs is seized by a group of Greenpeace activists and taken onboard the Greenpeace flower vessel.
heisig_constituent: seize, pack of wild dogs, radio caroline, flowers, vessels, turkey, crotch
heisig_story: A pack of wild dogs . . . flowers . . . vessels. Do not confuse this with the character for arrest (Frame 706).
Keyword_KANJIDIC: seize, get, find, earn, acquire, can, may, able to
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: захватить, получить, найти, заработать, приобрести, может, может, в состоянии
koohiiStory1: A pack of genetically-modified wild dogs is seized by a group of Greenpeace activists and taken onboard the Greenpeace vessel (the flower vessel, see safeguard (#700)).
koohiiStory2: Customs just seized a crate of poppies (flowers) detected by trained wild dogs who inspected the vessel.
jp_example_words:
獲物(えもの): game, spoils, trophy
獲得(かくとく): acquisition, possession
捕獲(ほかく): capture, seizure
WaniKani_Radicals: 犭, 艹, 隹, 又
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: You see an animal with some flowers and a turkey on a stool trying to seize them. The animal with the flowers is really tall so the turkey needs to stand on the stool in its attempt to seize the flowers.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Look at this turkey straining itself on the stool trying to seize the flowers, grunting with effort. You think he’ll ever get them?
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: The animal the turkey is trying to seize the flowers from is a cock (かく). The cock is a lot bigger than the turkey, so that’s why the turkey needs to stand on the stool in its attempt to seize those flowers.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine this scene again only with a big cock holding the flowers as the turkey attempts to seize them. Hear the cock shouting cock-a-doodle-doo as it defends its flowers.
Ru_Meaning: seize, get, find, earn, acquire, can, may, able to
Ru_Radicals: 又 (опять), 犯 (преступник), 艾 (мокса), 隹 (старая птица)
Ru_trainchinese: huò: (глаг) получать, приобретать; ловить, хватать
Kanshudo_mnemonic: you measure (蒦) the dog (犭) then seize it
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The wild dogs seize the delicious flowers before the pooch can get to them.
humanum_short_description_en: In ancient times, it is the same as " only ", see " only ".
_purpleculture_dictionary_orig_full:
獲 (Simplified: 获)
Pinyin: huò
English Definition: to catch; to obtain; to capture
Total strokes: 17; Radical: 犬
Pictophonetic: 蒦 indicates the sound; 犭 (dog) conveys the meaning.
Character Formation:
  • ⿰ Left to right
    • 犭 [ quǎn ] dog
    • 蒦 [ huò ] to measure; to calculate
Example Words:
獲得 [ huò dé ]: to obtain; to receive; to get
獲悉 [ huò xī ]: to learn of sth; to find out; to get news
獲取 [ huò qǔ ]: to gain; to get; to acquire
More: 獲* | *獲 | *獲*

Main pronunciation 主要发音: huò

Other pronunciations 其它发音: Not exists.

Original meaning 本义: Meaning to seize.

English senses 英语理解: obtain, get, receive; seize

Usage example 用法举例: 獲取 huò qǔ (obtain) 收获 shōu huò (harvest)

Importance by frequency 常用频率: 740

Shuowen 说文解字: 獵所獲也從犬蒦聲

Character decomposition 字形分解 :
Compound 獲 from dog-left 犭 quǎn and related phonetic capture-bird 蒦 huò (rem- 艹 cǎo) and (rem- 犾 yín) A101 获[獲穫] new-char 获.

Decomposition notes 字形分解说明 :
(- seize animal 犭)

Simplification rule : A101 获[獲穫]

Simplification rule explained :
new-char 获 borrowed-for-sound 獲穫 deleted-parts 隻獲 add-signific 犬 獲 (to capture a wild animal) 穫 (harvist crops)

Variant rule : C000

Variant rule clarification :

Applied rules :

New font rule :

Bronze characters (1)

Seal characters (1)

Liushutong characters (13)

獲字的基本解释

獲
huò
见“获”。

獲字的汉语字典释义

[①]［huò］
［《廣韻》胡麥切，入麥，匣。］
“获2”的繁体字。
(1)猎得；猎捕。
(2)俘获。
(3)指获胜，俘获敌众和缴获战利品。
(4)捕拿；逮捕。
(5)得到；取得。
(6)得到信任。
(7)指猎获物；捕获物。
(8)泛指获得之物。
(9)遭受；招致。
(10)得以；能够。
(11)误。
(12)玷污；被辱。
(13)古代对奴婢的贱称。
(14)指奴婢之子。
(15)射中目标。特指古射礼中射中鹄的。
(16)古代射礼中唱获时用以计数的一种器具。
(17)旋花科植物。葍的别名。
(18)通“矱”。法度；规则。
(19)通“穫”。收割庄稼。
(20)通“穫”。收获的谷物之类。
(21)通“嚄”。叫唤。
(22)古代水名。在今安徽省蒙城县与江苏省徐州市间。
[②]［huò］
［《集韻》黄郭切，入鐸，匣。］
“获3”的繁体字。
失意貌。
[③]［huò］
［《集韻》忽郭切，入鐸，曉。］
“获4”的

獲字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【犬字部】　獲； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页720第19
【唐韻】胡伯切【集韻】【韻會】胡陌切，?音韄。【說文】獵所獲也。【周禮·夏官·射人】三獲。【釋文】劉音胡伯反。　又【集韻】獸名。　又【集韻】亦姓。　又【廣韻】胡麥切，音畫。得也。【書·太甲】弗慮胡獲。【詩·小雅】笑語卒獲。【傳】獲，得時也。　又【爾雅·釋詁】馘，穧，獲也。【註】獲賊耳爲馘，獲禾爲穧。【詩·秦風】舍拔則獲。又【小雅】執訊獲醜。　又【廣韻】臧獲。《方言》云：荆淮海岱雜齊之閒，罵奴曰臧，罵婢曰獲。　又門名。【左傳·昭二十年】公孟有事于蓋獲之門外。【註】蓋獲，衞郭門。　又回獲，縣名。屬北地郡。見【前漢·地理志】。　又【廣韻】亦姓。宋大夫尹獲之後。　又【集韻】黃郭切，音鑊。隕獲，困迫失志貌。【禮·儒行】不隕獲于貧賤，通作穫。　又【集韻】【類篇】?忽郭切，音霍。恢廓貌。　又【集韻】胡故切，音護。【禮·曲禮】毋固獲。　又【集韻】胡化切，音話。爭取也。【周禮·春官·司常】凡射，共其獲旌。【註】獲旌，獲者所持旌。【釋文】李音胡霸反。

暂无。

huò

Get
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [huò]
["Guangyun" Hu Maiqie, enter the wheat, box. ]
The traditional characters of "得2".
(1) Hunting; hunting.
(2) Capture.
(3) Refers to winning, capturing the enemy and seizing the spoils.
(4) Capture; arrest.
(5) Obtain; obtain.
(6) To be trusted.
(7) Refers to prey; catch.
(8) Generally refers to what is obtained.
(9) Suffer; incur.
(10) To be able to; to be able to.
(11) Wrong.
(12) Defile; be humiliated.
(13) Ancient name for slaves and maids.
(14) Refers to the son of a slave and maidservant.
(15) Hit the target. Especially refers to the shot in the ancient shooting ceremony.
(16) An instrument used for counting in ancient shooting ceremony.
(17) Convolvulaceae plants. Ali's alias.
(18) Through "矱". Law; rule.
(19) Through "Get". Reap the crops.
(20) Through "Get". Harvested cereals and the like.
(21) Through "嚄". Scream.
(22) Ancient water names. Between present-day Mengcheng County in Anhui Province and Xuzhou City in Jiangsu Province.
[②]［huò］
["Ji Yun" Huang Guoqie, enter the duo, box. ]
Traditional characters for "得3".
Disappointed appearance.
[③] [huò]
["Ji Yun" Suddenly Guo Qi, enters Duo, Xiao. ]
"Get 4"

[Si Ji 2] [Dog Character Department] 　 Huo; Kangxi Strokes: 18; Page Number: Page 720 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Hu Boqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Hu Moqie,? Yin Yun. [Said the text] The hunting ground also obtained. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Shooting】Three wins. 【Explanation】Liu Yin and Hu Bofan.　[Jiyun] The name of the beast.　[Jiyun] Also last name.　[Guangyun] Hu Maiqie, audio and video. Got it. 【Book·Taijia】Further and random. [Poetry·Xiaoya] The laughter died out. [Pass] To get, to get in time.　[Erya·Shi Xie] 馘, 穧, get also. 【Note】Getting the ears of the thieves is 馘, and getting the hees is 穧. 【Poetry·Qin Feng】Successfully wins. [Xiaoya] was embarrassed during the interrogation.　[Guang Yun] Zang Huo. "Dialect" says: Jinghuaihaidai is mixed with leisure, calling slaves called Zang, and calling maidservants called gain.　Another name. [Zuo Zhuan·20th year] Gongmeng had something to do outside the gate of Gaihuo. [Note] Gai Huo, Wei Guomen.　Received again, the county name. Belongs to Northland County. See [Former Han Geography].　[Guangyun] Also last name. After Dr. Song Yin won.　[Jiyun] Huang Guoqie, sound wok. Lost, trapped and disheartened. 【Ritual·Confucianism】Don't fall from the poor and humble, just make the gain.　[Ji Yun] [Class Chapter]? Suddenly Guo Qi, Yin Huo. Extensive appearance.　[Jiyun] Hu Gu cut, sound protection. 【Rituals·Courtesy】No solid gains.　[Jiyun] Hu Huaqie, voice talk. Fight also. 【Zhou Li·Chun Guan·Sichang】Every shot, a total of them received banners. [Note] Jing is obtained, and the one holds the Jing. [Explanation] Li Yin and Hu tyrannical.

Get
Name meaning
Nothing.
huò
вм. 获
Radicals: 犭, 艹, 隹, 又  (animal, flowers, turkey, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
You see an animal with some flowers and a turkey on a stool trying to seize them. The animal with the flowers is really tall so the turkey needs to stand on the stool in its attempt to seize the flowers.
Look at this turkey straining itself on the stool trying to seize the flowers, grunting with effort. You think he’ll ever get them?
Reading Mnemonic
The animal the turkey is trying to seize the flowers from is a cock (かく). The cock is a lot bigger than the turkey, so that’s why the turkey needs to stand on the stool in its attempt to seize those flowers.
Imagine this scene again only with a big cock holding the flowers as the turkey attempts to seize them. Hear the cock shouting cock-a-doodle-doo as it defends its flowers.
